casebody.data:
Aisha D. FLOOD, Administrator of the Estate of Maurice A. Harden, Plaintiff,
v.
Jonathan Henry CREWS, individually, and Jonathan Henry Crews, in his capacity as a member of Raleigh Police Department, and City of Raleigh, Defendants. No. COA17-740 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: July 17, 2018

AFFIRMED.
